src:
En enero o febrero, el juicio político a Trump: Esquivel | Video
 by Redacción AN / OC



El periodista Jesús Esquivel presenta la novela “Tu cabello es la frontera”, que publica editorial Grijalbo, la cual relata hechos conocidos por él en ambos lados de la frontera. Además, informa que Nancy Pelosi, líder de la Cámara de representantes, ha detallado el mecanismo de audiencias que formará parte del juicio político a Donald Trump, mientras los republicanos han declarado que lo defenderán a capa y espada.
text:
In January or February, Trump's political trial: Esquivel | Video
 by AN / OC Writing



The journalist Jesús Esquivel presents the novel "Your hair is the border", which publishes Grijalbo editorial, which recounts facts known to him on both sides of the border. In addition, he reports that Nancy Pelosi, leader of the House of Representatives, has detailed the mechanism of hearings that will be part of the political trial of Donald Trump, while the Republicans have declared that they will defend him by cape and sword.
